channel.title: vRealize Operations on vCROCS
channel.description: Recent content in vRealize Operations on vCROCS

item.title: Year in Review - 2021 | 2022 Goals
item.description: Get-Review 2021 2021 was a good year for me with my career. I spent the entire year working from home and I find myself to be more productive when WFH.

item.title: How vRealize Operations can help with Right Sizing VMs
item.description: Using vROPS Data to help show APP Owners Proper VM Sizing: vRealize Operations does a good job to show you what the correct number for vCPU/Memory settings should be based on monitoring history.

item.title: vRealize Operations 8.x - New Features
item.description: The New vRealize Operations Features I use the most. Donut Charts. This is one of my favorite new features.
